description_en: This wide-barreled cannon emits a stream of red-tinged energy that originates from the weaponâ€™s heavy proton tank, affecting all enemies in a line. Like most disintegrator weapons, they are available in liquidator, decimator, executioner, and eradicator models.
source: Starfinder Dead Suns Adventure Path pg. 240, Starfinder #2: Temple of the Twelve pg. 52, Starfinder Armory pg. 36
